articles.title: Trump should face insurrection, obstruction charges, US Capitol riot panel says - Rappler
articles.description: The request marks the first time in history that the American Congress has referred a former president for criminal prosecution
articles.content: WASHINGTON – The US House of Representatives panel probing the January 6, 2021, attack on the Capitol asked federal prosecutors on Monday, December 19, to charge Donald Trump with four crimes, includ… [+5615 chars]

articles.title: Amber Heard settles bitter US defamation case with Johnny Depp - The Telegraph
articles.description: Actress agrees $1m settlement as she hits out at American legal system for turning recent trial into a media circus
articles.content:

articles.title: Many Involved in Open Relationships Face Stigma, Research Shows - HealthDay News
